**2022-06-08 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz**

**Accepted**

- **cmd/go: \`go list -e -m -json all\` to start displaying hashes of modules** [#52792](https://golang.org/issue/52792)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net/http: support for the 103 status code** [#51914](https://golang.org/issue/51914)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **cmd/go: GOWORK env var should be off by default** [#51967](https://golang.org/issue/51967)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **do something smart with virtual machine forks & crypto** [#52544](https://golang.org/issue/52544)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **strconv: export unquote and appendQuotedWith** [#51887](https://golang.org/issue/51887)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **errors: add new function Temporary(error) bool** [#37250](https://golang.org/issue/37250)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **fmt: add flags to control printing of slices** [#52936](https://golang.org/issue/52936)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/net/html: Allow getting raw HTML attribute values on Tokenizer** [#52911](https://golang.org/issue/52911)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
